item.description:
Ah... no, there's no emergency, except for the fact latest edition of Skeptical Enquirer is out! It's their yearly Halloween edition (Came out Nov 1 - go figure): Monster Mayhem! We'll have this meeting in the Borders Bookstore Cafe in Providence Place Mall this coming Thursday. Borders sells SI magazine - so if anyone wants a copy of it, it will be right there to buy.

I will have a laptop opened with the RI Skeptics Facebook logo displayed on it.

It's been a busy month and I'm now trying to get back into the swing of doing this twice a month or so. With luck we can have one or two more meetings before the end of the year.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a laptop opened with the RI Skeptics Facebook logo displayed on it.
item.name: Skeptics in the Coffee Shop - EMERGENCY MEETING!!!! (kind of - but not really)
